video_prompt: The video captures the moment a civilian airliner prepares for and executes takeoff on a wide, open runway. The scene is set against a backdrop of a flat landscape and a partly cloudy sky, with the sound of the plane's engine providing an immersive audio experience. The airliner moves from a stationary position to full speed, and finally lifts off, showcasing the power and precision of modern aviation.
audio_prompt: The sound of the plane's engine roars
